content: patterns for commercial purposes garland step pictures video leave 22 cm / 8 5/8 end to make a hanging loop later on 1st star round 1 make a slip knot chain 12 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook do not count one on hook slip_stitch in each of next 3 chain counts as double_crochet 13 double_crochet in chain-4 ring slip_stitch in 2 sts at the same time 3rd out of 3 slip_stitch and chain it was made in round 2 slip_stitch in each of next 3 chain counts as double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 1st out of 13 double_crochet in chain- 4 ring chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain-2 picot chain 2 slip_stitch in last double_crochet in front lp and 1 strand from post chain 3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 6 times chain 3 slip_stitch in 2 sts at the same time 3rd slip_stitch and chain it was made in slip_stitch in each of next 2 chain counts as chain-2 picot slip_stitch in slip knot make a big lp pass yarn skein through lp tighten stars 2 - 10 skip 16 cm / 6 ¼ of yarn between 2 stars repeat 1st star 9 times cut off yarn leaving 22 cm / 8 5/8 end hanging loops fold 9 cm / 3 ½ and tie a knot creating about 16 cm / 6 ¼ loop to hang the garland repeat for beginning end finishing steam-block stiffen if desired 4 copyright © 2019 natalia kononova all rights reserved all documents are the property of natalia kononova no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes leave 22 cm / 8 5/8 end to make a chain 12 hanging loop later on 1st star round 1 make a slip knot slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook do not count one slip_stitch in each of next 3 chain counts as double_crochet on hook 13 double_crochet in chain-4 ring slip_stitch in 2 sts at the same time 3rd out of 3 slip_stitch and chain it was made in 5 copyright © 2019 natalia kononova all rights reserved all documents are the property of natalia kononova no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes round 2 slip_stitch in each of next 3 chain counts chain 3 as double_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet 1st out of 13 double_crochet in chain-4 chain 3 ring double_crochet in next double_crochet chain-2 picot chain 2 6 copyright © 2019 natalia kononova all rights reserved all documents are the property of natalia kononova no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes slip_stitch in last double_crochet in front lp and 1 strand from post chain 3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 6 times chain 3 slip_stitch in
